      • getRoles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRoles(java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from class: RestService
        A user who belongs to any role in the returned list is allowed to perform this action/method. Override to open access beyond Site Admin.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        list of role names or null if authorization not required
